title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I try to view the type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the type hierarchy of a binary project like org.apache.ant.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open a binary project in the IDE and try to view its type hierarchy.
